content: I'm already working on the relocation of the creatures in the Ecohouse. Once the <style=Highlight>Omni-Gallery</style> is ready, they'll be able to move into a more spacious "home."
info: 万象馆建成_主流程文本II

content: You're wondering what I plan to do next? Of course, it's "moss-ing out the plan"! <style=SizeSmall>Pretty funny, isn't it?</style>
info: 万象馆建成_主流程文本II

content: You can pick up the expansion order for the <style=Highlight>Omni-Gallery</style> at <style=Highlight>Mitai Construction</style>. Sorry, you've been running all over the place, and I haven't been much help. <style=SizeSmall>Where did my gold card get to? Which crab is the culprit?</style>
info: 万象馆建成_主流程文本II
